name: Release 3.0.0
body:
OwnRecipes! \o/
Initially release of this fork from OpenEats.

Following the most noteworthy changes. For a full list see [Milestone v3.0.0](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/milestone/1?closed=1).

Changes for web:
- Web built with CRA and TypeScript
- Revamp UI, like dark mode, fully responsive, more modern etc.
- Language and Theme can be configured by users. ([#38](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/38), [#39](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/39))
- Improve Header: sticky header, search, options ([#49](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/49))
- Improve Footer: About, Legal, Privacy ([#46](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/46))
- News page reorganized ([#34](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/34))
- Recipe form revamped. Cuisine and curses are optional, empty values are handled nicely etc. ([#17](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/17), [#18](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/18), [#19](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/19), [#20](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/20), [#29](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/29), [#43](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/43))
- Recipe view revamped ([#13](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/13), [#24](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/24), [#28](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/28), [#30](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/30) [#36](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/36))
- Browser search revamped ([#27](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/27))
- Dedicated Random recipe page: Get up to 8 random recipes. ([#11](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/11), [#50](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/50))
- Private mode: If active, users have to log in to view any content. ([#26](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/26))
- Warn when a navigation would cause data loss ([#23](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/23))
- Wake lock on recipe page to prevent device from sleeping ([#33](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/33))
- Add Baseurl to allow subfolder hosting ([#44)(https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/44))
- Demo page working and so nice! ([#51](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/51))
- Docker: Web use production build ([#54](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/54))

Changes for api:
- Add support for images larger than 500 KB ([#3](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/3))
- Automatically reduce size for uploaded photos ([#12](https://github.com/ownrecipes/ownrecipes-api/issues/12))
- Enable server-side logging ([#52](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/52))
- OpenAPI specification ([#16](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/16))
- Reversed proxy: Photo urls not served over https ([#48](Reversed proxy: Photo urls not served over https))
- PATCH Recipe returns incomplete photo urls ([#7](https://github.com/ownrecipes/ownrecipes-api/issues/7))

Dependencies:
- Api: Django 3.2.14, gunicorn 20.0.4, python 3.8.13
- Web: React 17.0.2, React-Bootstrap 2.4.0, Node 16.15
